Articles.Content: I just installed Realism overhaul and when i am starting game, it gets stuck loading the stock nerva engine, the part path is Squad/parts/ingine/liquidengineLV-N/nuclearEngine. if you need more info tell me

Alas we do. There's a nice big fat sticky at the top of this forum that details how to post your logs, and what other info we need. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Silly me.. misread!

Have a look at the log file (KSP.log) in the game root folder, and search for the related problem... what you'll find is that the problem is just beyond the nerva engine, on the next mod/item load.

How's your computer memory.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-28T14:00:35Z" title="07/28/2015 02:00  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 28, 2015</time> by ColKlonk**
